content.text: It’s time to up our game—let’s make a smiley face! To begin, start drawing the left eye. Type: light.on(D5)
We need to turn on the light underneath also. Add another line of code below by typing: light.on(D6)
One more to go! Type: light.on(D7)
Great! Press MAKE to see the eye. We can use the same code to draw the right eye, too. Type light.on(F5) to begin the second eye.
And light.on(F6)
Finally, turn on the last light with light.on(F7) to complete the eyes.
The last step is to draw the mouth. There’s a special trick you can use write it faster. Type: light.on(C9, D10, E10, F10, G9)
We’re ready to try it out! Press MAKE . :) Challenge: what other emoji can you make? Can you make a sad face?
